job_history.work_description: Respond to and resolve issues or questions raised by employees or leaders regarding benefits, payroll, HR policies/procedures, general transactions or other HR-related activities. Utilizes in-bound phone queue, e-mail, and face to face to receive inquiries as well as provide resolution. Provide accurate information and counsel to employees and/or people leaders on their questions and issues, escalating when appropriate.

Trained under and worked with senior management to create HR policies and procedures; recruit employees; create group benefits databases; and develop orientation, training and incentive programs. Manage leave-of-absence programs and personnel records; administer benefits enrollment and programs; administer HR budget; and handle HR assistant workplace issues.

Assist advisor and clients in processing and maintain financial products and services offerings. Provide guidance and assistance on updating consumer lending products and other financial products. Interacting with intra-company teams and providing assistance in completing customer cases and product offerings.

Customer assistance for personal/business/consumer lending products. Working with Wells Fargo partners in private banking, insurance, mortgage, investment and retirement to increase solutions and profits. Coaching and working with tellers and customer representatives in maximizing service and sales solutions.

skills.name: HR Policies and Procedures
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in creating and implementing HR policies and procedures, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Involved in recruitment process as an HR Assistant, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Handled employee inquiries and issues, and provided counseling, showing strong proficiency in employee relations.

skills.name: Benefits Administration
skills.explanation: Administered benefits enrollment and programs, and managed leave-of-absence programs, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Developed orientation, training, and incentive programs, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Utilized various communication channels to receive and respond to employee inquiries, showing strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided assistance to clients and customers in various roles, indicating strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Financial Products and Services
skills.explanation: Assisted in processing and maintaining financial products and services, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Coached and worked with tellers and customer representatives, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.
